name: Church of Darkness
description:
Welcome to Church of Darkness, a horror-puzzle text adventure RPG.

You are trapped- and you must wander about the dark halls of an old church, solving small puzzles as you go to progress. Little does you, the player character, know, that you are not alone...

SAFETY WARNING! - One ending of the game may be triggering for those with photosensitive epilepsy. (Ironically, the creator of this game is photosensitive. However, this game was developed before the health issues started). 

CONTENT WARNING!- Brief mentions of blood, death/animal death, and brief mention of implied self harm. Recurring mention of occult and religious themes.
